title: Jr Data Scientist
description: Job DescriptionThe JR Data Scientistrole is responsible for designing and managing universe studies, setting up the extrapolation for Retail Panels, documenting methodologies, ensuring quality assurance, and monitoring key performance indicators (KPIs) related to Panel Health.This role requires a strong background in data analysis, statistical modeling, and quality control processes as well as strong production system processes for PoS key activities:1. Methodology and Universe Studies:• Design and manage universe studies, including project management.• Document methodologies for transparency and provide clear explanations of existing methods.• Review results of universe studies and insert changes in the POS Manager. • Conduct impact analysis of universe studies.• Design and simulate extrapolation setups for new panels and sign off on the designs.2. Quality Assurance:• Optimize samples by analyzing shop contributions, detecting MDQC (Market Data Quality Check) outliers, meeting target sample requirements, and addressing issues like empty shops and slow sales.• Detect and address systematic methodological issues and prepare cleanup impacts for critical findings (end-to-end).3. Modeling and Extrapolation:• Model missing retailers completely outside the system and maintain complex models.• Support the setup of modeling missing retailers in the system and hand over to Stat Ops for ongoing maintenance and execution.• Implement new country-channel setups, including reviewing channel definitions, designing universes and samples, and providing setup instructions.4. Quality Monitoring:• Resolve Level 2 methodology clarification issues.• Monitor KPIs and conduct root cause analysis (RCA) for panel health, focusing on samples, missing retailers, universes, copy shops, and MDQC related to samples and extrapolation.• Define and specify improvement points for panel health.Qualifications• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.• Proficiency in statistical modeling and data analysis.• Experience with quality assurance and sample optimization. •Ability to document and explain complex methodologies clearly. • Familiarity with KPI monitoring and root cause analysis.• Excellent communication and organizational skills.• Ability to work independently and as part of a team.• Knowing production processes for PoS • Extensive experience of working in an international environment• Strong quality orientation and solution driven• Strong command of the English language• Extensive experience within Panel Quality value chain• High knowledge about all PoS (RMS) value chainsThis role is ideal for individuals with a keen eye for detail and a passion for data science and quality assurance.
